biotools.summary: Comprehensive guide designer (CGD) is a python based on-target scoring method for CRISPRi, CRISPRa, Cas9, Cas9 (non-canonical) and Cas12a sequences.They are consortium of scores such as CGDi, CGDa, CGD9, CGD9NG and CGD12a, which are based on ENLOR(ELastic Net Logistic Regression) weights.

bioschemas.name: CGD
bioschemas.summary: Comprehensive guide designer (CGD) is a python based on-target scoring method for CRISPRi, CRISPRa, Cas9, Cas9 (non-canonical) and Cas12a sequences.They are consortium of scores such as CGDi, CGDa, CGD9, CGD9NG and CGD12a, which are based on ENLOR(ELastic Net Logistic Regression) weights.
